text: x vector list containing overlap items, names represent overlaps. example name "&B" represents overlap set "" set "B". input passed overlaplist2setlist(). Input x can vector single items overlap, multiple items per overlap, input x list item vectors. Note setlist passed overlaplist2setlist() return setlist unchanged. proportional, item_degrees, item_buffer, item_style, plot_warning arguments passed venndir(). item_cex numeric passed venndir(), however item_cex length=1, extended length=2 order prevent auto-scaling adjustment typically used, adjusts font size based upon relative area overlap polygon. cases scaling helpful Venn memes. enable auto-scaling, use item_cex=NULL. See help text venndir() details. keep_item_order logical default TRUE, maintain labels order provided overlap. Use FALSE label sorted using jamba::mixedSort() true alphanumeric sort. plot_warning logical passed render_venndir() determine whether plot warnings caused proportional Euler diagrams display overlapping regions. relevant venn_meme() FALSE default. draw_legend logical indicating whether draw Venn diagram legend, default FALSE since relevant venn_meme(). argument passed render_venndir(). verbose logical indicating whether print verbose output. ... additional arguments passed venndir().

title: Venn Meme — venn_meme
text: function simple wrapper venndir() settings designed create Venn Meme. output expected display usually one item labels inside Venn overlap region, counts set labels. given character vector list character vectors, names, deduce number Venn sets length: 1: one set 3: two-set Venn overlap 7: three-set Venn overlaps. Effort made overlaps defined "clockwise" starting first second sets. 15: four-set Venn, two special cases: 13 length, proportional=TRUE, create proportional circles, showing 13 overlaps visibly possible. overlaps recognized order appear, clockwise around center. Use venn_meme(1:13, proportional=TRUE) see order. 15 length, /proportional=FALSE, create non-proportional ellipses. Use venn_meme(1:15) see order overlaps. 31: five-set Venn overlaps. Use venn_meme(1:31) see order overlaps. yet, order overlaps defined clockwise. Good luck ! argument item_cex used adjust item font size, vector applied items overlap set order, number overlap sets, sorted order set names order provided. specific definitive ordering, run make_venn_combn_df(x) x vector set names. rownames output determine order item_cex applied. practice, use trial error adjust label suitable size. input x intended convenient method specifying items overlap set. x names, assumed represent convenient Venn diagram based upon length x: length(x) 1, 2, 3: two-way Venn diagram length(x) length 7,15,31: three-way Venn diagram length(x) length 15: four-way Venn diagram length(x) length 31: five-way Venn diagram three sets represented, may helpful use proportional Venn diagram, known Euler diagram, proportional=TRUE. Note circular shapes always represent every overlap, can use proportional ellipse shapes proportional=TRUE, shape="ellipse". overlap set displayed proportional diagram, default plot_warning=FALSE means warning displayed. intent function provide easy "clean" diagram.

title: Venn Meme — venn_meme
code:
bix <- list( s="Stats", cs="Computer
Science", b="Biology", `s&b`="Biostatistics", `s&cs`="Data
Science", `cs&b`="Computational
Biology", `s&cs&b`="Bioinformatics") venn_meme(bix) # some customizations, proportional=TRUE looks better venn_meme(bix, proportional=TRUE, outerborder="#FFFFFF99", innerborder=NA, rotate_degrees=360/6, item_cex=rep(c(2, 1.4, 2) * 1.3, c(3, 3, 1))) # superhero? avlist <- c( AV="LEX
LUTHOR", ML="MOUNTAIN
LION", T="TODDLER", `AV&ML`="Wants to
kill you", `AV&T`="Goes off on
a lot of rambling
monologues", `ML&T`="Resists
taking a bath", `AV&ML&T`="Impossible
to reason with" ) venn_meme(avlist, fontfamily="Trebuchet MS", set_colors=c("maroon", "palegoldenrod", "skyblue"), outerborder="white", innerborder=NA, item_cex=rep(c(2, 1.6, 1.3, 1.7, 1.5), c(3, 1, 1, 1, 1))) # what the actual heck wtahv <- c("What", "the", "actual", "HECK"); wtah <- (unlist(lapply(seq_along(wtahv), function(i){ im <- t(combn(wtahv, i)) jamba::nameVector( jamba::pasteByRow(sep="
", im), jamba::pasteByRow(sep="&", im)) }))) venn_meme(wtah, item_cex=0.7, fontfamily="Impact") # circular 4-way shapes venn_meme(wtah, proportional=TRUE, shape="circle", outerborder="grey", innerborder=NA, item_cex=0.8, fontfamily="Impact") # for proportional diagrams it may be helpful to use shape="ellipse" venn_meme(wtah, proportional=TRUE, shape="ellipse", outerborder="white", innerborder=NA, fontfamily="Impact", item_cex_factor=0.6) # happiness in sports em <- list( a="short-lived
happiness", b="prolonged

through your

a sports
fan" venn_meme(em, fontfamily="serif", item_cex_factor=0.9, set_colors=c("gold", "dodgerblue3", "firebrick3")) # Mister Venn mrvenn <- c( sty="Style", fh="Facial
Hair", str="Strong", t="Team", f="Fools", fu="Funny", r="Rich", `sty&fh`="Mr
Potato

Bump", `f&fu`="Mr

Burns", `r&sty`="Mr

Motivator", `fh&str&t`="Mr
Baseball", `str&t&f`="Mr
Strong", `t&f&fu`="Mr
Funny", `f&fu&r`="Mr
Magoo", `fu&r&sty`="Mr
Benn", `r&sty&fh`="Mr
Monopoly", `sty&fh&str&t&f&fu&r`="Mr T" ) venn_meme(mrvenn, item_cex_factor=0.7, outerborder="white", innerborder=NA, proportional=TRUE, fontfamily="Avenir") # example of ordered item labels item_list <- list( CLE=(c("**CLE**:", "IFNα > IFNβ", "Anti-malarials effective therapy for skin disease")), DM=(c("**DM**:", "IFNβ > IFNα", "Triggered by immune stimulating herbal supplements", " Anti-malarials effective in 25%, commonly causes morbilliform rash", " Cannabinoid receptor agonist proising treatment" )), `CLE&DM`=(c( "Photosensitivity", "Triggered by viral and bacterial infections", "Increased type I IFN"))) vo <- venndir::venn_meme(x=item_list, fontfamily="Times New Roman", outerborder="white", innerborder=NA, item_cex=c(1.3, 1.2, 1.3) , item_buffer=c(-0.5, -0.2, -0.75), set_colors=c("darkorchid3", "gold"), poly_alpha=0.3, xyratio=5, spread=TRUE, item_style="gridtext", jitter_cex=0)

title: Directional Venn diagram — venndir
text:
setlist list named vectors, whose names represent set items, whose values represent direction using values c(-1, 0, 1). overlap_type character value indicating type overlap logic: "" records combination signs; "overlap" disregards sign returns match item overlap; "concordance" represents counts full agreement, "mixed" inconsistent overlapping direction; "agreement" represents full agreement direction "agreement", "mixed" inconsistent direction. sets integer index optional subset sets setlist Venn diagram. option useful defining consistent set_colors entries setlist. set_colors character vector R colors, default NULL use categorical colors defined colorjam::rainbowJam(). generate colors every element setlist even subset defined sets. setlist_labels character vector optional custom labels display Venn diagram. option intended names(setlist) suitable display, still maintained original names. legend_labels character vector optional custom labels display Venn legend. option intended names(setlist) suitable legend, still maintained original names. legend labels typically single-line entries relatively short text length. draw_legend logical passed render_venndir(), stored Venndir metadata. legend_font_cex numeric scalar, default 1, used adjust relative size fonts venndir_legender() draw_legend=TRUE. value stored metadata persistence. proportional logical (default FALSE) indicating whether draw proportional Venn circles, also known Euler diagram. Proportional circles guaranteed represent possible overlaps. Proportional circles determined calling eulerr::eulerr(). Use shape="ellipse" eulerr() provide elliptical shapes. show_labels character string define labels display, displayed. definition uses single letter indicate type label display, using UPPERCASE display label outside Venn shape, lowercase display label inside Venn shape. default "Ncs" displays _N_ame (outside), _c_ount (inside), _s_igned count (inside). label types defined : _N_ame: "n" "N" - set name, default displayed. _O_verlap: "o" "O" - overlap name, default hidden, labels can long, also overlap evident Venn diagram already. _c_ount: "c" "C" - overlap count, independent sign _p_ercentage: "p" "P" - overlap percentage, default hidden, available option _s_igned count: "s" "S" - signed overlap count, tabulated based upon overlap_type ("", "concordant", "agreement", etc/) _i_tems: "" , default hidden. enabled, item labels defined show_items spread across specific Venn overlap region. main character string used plot title, default NULL render title. provided, rendered using gridtext::richtext_grob() enables Markdown-style formatting. title stored venndir@metadata$main persistence. return_items logical (default TRUE) indicating whether return items overlap data. FALSE item labels also displayed figure. main reason return items conserve memory, example setlist extremely large. show_items character used define item label, used show_label entry includes "" enables item display inside Venn diagram. "item": shows item labels "sign": shows sign item "sign items": shows sign item together ("item sign" show item, sign). max_items numeric (default 3000) indicating maximum number item labels display enabled. show_zero logical (default FALSE) indicating whether empty overlaps labeled count zero 0. show_zero=TRUE count zero label displayed, otherwise count label shown. font_cex numeric vector recycled applied order: Set label Overlap count label Signed count label default c(1, 1, 0.7) defines signed count label slightly smaller labels. one value provided, multiplied c(1, 1, 0.7) adjust font sizes altogether, keeping relative sizes. two values provided, multiplied c(1, 1, 0.7) using second value twice. three values provided, used -without change. fontfamily character string define fontfamily. Default "sans" get mapped supported font graphics device. fontfamily must match recognized font given output device, font must capable producing UTF-8 / Unicode characters, order print arrow arrow. may review systemfonts::system_fonts() listing fonts recognized ragg devices, seems best overall font capabilities. work, either use unicode=FALSE, check output Sys.getlocale() ensure setting capable using UTF-8 (example "C" may sufficient). Using package ragg appears consistently successful rasterized output base R output, example: ragg::agg_png(), ragg::agg_tiff(), ragg::agg_jpeg() produce substantially higher quality output, successful usage system fonts, png(), tiff(), jpeg(). Similarly, PDF output, consider cairo_pdf() Cairo::CairoPDF() instead using pdf(). poly_alpha numeric (default 0.6) value 0 1, alpha transparency polygon fill color. value ignored alpha_by_counts=TRUE. poly_alpha=1 completely opaque (transparency) poly_alpha=0.8 80% opaque alpha_by_counts logical indicating whether define alpha transparency Venn polygon fill based upon counts contained polygon. TRUE poly_alpha ignored. label_style character string indicating style labels. Label color adjusted based upon determined background color, determined based upon label fill color, either device background color, Venn overlap fill color. pre-defined label styles. "basic" background shading "fill" opaque colored background "shaded" partially transparent colored background "lite" partially transparent lite background "box" adds dark border around label region label_preset character deprecated favor show_labels. argument passed venndir_label_style(). template character (default "wide") describing default layout counts signed counts. value stored venndir@metadata$template persistence. "wide" - main counts left, right-justified; signed counts right, left-justified. option preferred small numbers, less-crowded diagrams. "tall" - main counts, center-justified; signed counts main counts, center-justified. option recommended large numbers (1000 items single overlap region), crowded diagrams. unicode logical (default TRUE) indicating whether display Unicode arrows signed overlaps. Passed curate_venn_labels(). Use unicode=FALSE signed label displayed properly. common causes: (1) R console (terminal) configured allow Unicode (UTF-8 UTF-16) characters; (2) display font contain Unicode characters font set. big.mark character (default ",") passed format() augment numeric labels. curate_df data.frame NULL passed curate_venn_labels(), used customize formatting signed overlaps. venn_jp NULL optional JamPolygon contains one polygon setlist, intended allow custom shapes used. Otherwise get_venn_polygon_shapes() called. inside_percent_threshold numeric (default 0) indicating percent area Venn overlap region must contain order count label displayed inside region, otherwise label displayed outside region. Values expected range 0 100. item_cex numeric default 1, used define baseline font size (single value), exact font cex values (multiple values). single value provided, set items used define font scaling, based upon relative area overlap polygon max item polygon area, number items polygon. values multiplied item_cex produce final adjustment. values multiplied item_cex_factor. multiple values provided, recycled number polygons contain items, applied order. adjustment polygon area, number labels. values multiplied item_cex_factor. item_style character string (default "text") indicating style display item labels enabled. "default" detects whether item labels contain "
" newlines, uses "gridtext" case, otherwise uses "text" markedly faster. "text" option substantially faster, allow markdown. "gridtext": substantially slower large number labels, enables use limited markdown calling gridtext::richtext_grob(). Mostly useful venn_meme(). item_buffer numeric value (default -0.15) indicating buffer adjustment applied Venn overlap regions arranging item labels. Passed label_fill_JamPolygon() via render_venndir(). Negative values recommended, shrink region. sign_count_delim character string used delimiter sign counts, overlap_type "overlap". padding numeric padding units "mm" (default c(3, 2)) overlap count, signed overlap count labels, order. r numeric radius units "mm" used rounded rectangle corners labels. visible label_preset includes background fill ("lite", "shaded", "fill"), "box". center numeric coordinates relative plot bounding box, default c(0, -0.15) uses center point middle (x=0) slightly (y=-0.15) plot center. used place labels outside diagram. short, labels placed drawing line center point, outward Venn overlap region labeled. label positioned outside polygon region segment_distance. default c(0, -0.15) ensures labels tend top plot, left/right side plot. argument passed along label_outside_JamPolygon(). segment_distance numeric value, default 0.05, distance outside labels outer edge Venn diaram region, relative size Venn polygons. default 0.05 approximately 5% buffer outside. Note labels placed outside (using show_labels) outside label coordinates used define plot range, causes Venn diagram shrink accordingly. sep character used delimiter set names, default "&". do_plot `logical (default TRUE) indicating whether generate figure. do_plot=TRUE calls render_venndir() create grid objects displayed. Arguments ... passed render_venndir(): hide display, use do_draw=FALSE. prevent calling grid::grid.newpage() plot can drawn inside another active display device, use do_newpage=FALSE. do_plot=FALSE returned Venndir object can passed render_venndir() render figure. points valid regarding do_draw do_newpage, arguments verbose logical indicating whether print verbose output. debug numeric optional internal debug. circle_nudge list numeric x,y vectors. yet re-implemented version 0.0.30.900 update. rotate_degrees numeric value degrees, allowing rotation Venn diagram. yet re-implemented version 0.0.30.900. ... additional arguments passed render_venndir().

title: Directional Venn diagram — venndir
text: Venndir object slots: "jps": JamPolygon contains set polygon, overlap polygon defined Venn diagram. "label_df": data.frame contains coordinates Venn set, Venn overlap label. "setlist": list input venndir(). entry may empty. do_plot=TRUE function also calls render_venndir(), returns grid graphical objects (grobs) attributes: "gtree": grid::gTree object suitable drawing grid::grid.draw(attr(vo, "gtre")) "grob_list": list grid object components used build complete diagram, can plotted individually, assembled .call(grid::gList, grob_list). grid::gList can assembled gTree : grid::grobTree(gList=.call(grid::gList, grob_list) "viewport": grid::viewport holds important context graphical objects, specifically use coordinate grid::unit measure "snpc", maintains fixed aspect ratio.

title: Directional Venn diagram — venndir
code:
setlist <- make_venn_test(100, 3, do_signed=FALSE); setlist <- make_venn_test(100, 3, do_signed=TRUE); vo <- venndir(setlist) jamba::sdim(vo); #> rows cols class #> jps 10 JamPolygon #> label_df 21 32 data.frame #> setlist 3 list #> metadata 16 list # custom set labels vo <- venndir(setlist, setlist_labels=paste("set", LETTERS[1:3])) # custom set labels with Markdown custom colors vo <- venndir(setlist, setlist_labels=paste0("Set ", LETTERS[1:3], "")) # custom set and legend labels vo <- venndir(setlist, setlist_labels=paste0("set
", LETTERS[1:3]), legend_labels=paste("Set", LETTERS[1:3])) # custom set and legend labels # proportional # Set Name is inside with show_labels having lowercase "n" vo <- venndir(setlist, proportional=TRUE, show_labels="ncs", label_style="lite box", setlist_labels=paste0("Set: ", LETTERS[1:3]), legend_labels=paste("Set", LETTERS[1:3]))

title: venndir label style — venndir_label_style
text: venndir label style

title: venndir label style — venndir_label_style
code:
venndir_label_style( venndir_output, show_labels = c("Nsc"), label_preset = c("none", "main inside", "main outside", "outside", "all outside", "concept", "meme", "items", "main items", "main count items", "custom"), label_style = c("basic", "box", "fill", "fill_box", "shaded", "shaded_box", "lite", "lite_box"), lite = "#FFEEAABB", bg = "white", set = c("outside", "inside", "none"), overlap = c("none", "inside", "outside"), percent = c("none", "inside", "outside"), count = c("inside", "outside", "ifneeded", "detect", "none"), signed = c("inside", "outside", "ifneeded", "detect", "none"), items = c("none", "inside"), percent_delim = "
", show_items = NULL, max_items = 3000, inside_percent_threshold = 0, label_types = c("main", "signed"), extra_styles = list(percent = c("***", "***")), show_zero = TRUE, sep = "&", useGrey = 15, verbose = FALSE, ... )

title: venndir label style — venndir_label_style
text:
show_labels character string describe count labels display, . presence letter enables label, UPPERCASE places label outside Venn diagram, lowercase places label inside. default "Ncs" displays _N_ame (outside), _c_ount (inside), _s_igned count (inside). overlap_type="overlap" signed label hidden default. label types defined : _N_ame: "n" "N" - set name, default displayed. _O_verlap: "o" "O" - overlap name, default hidden, labels can long, also overlap evident Venn diagram already. _c_ount: "c" "C" - overlap count, independent sign _p_ercentage: "p" "P" - overlap percentage, default hidden, available option _s_igned count: "s" "S" - signed overlap count, tabulated based upon overlap_type ("", "concordant", "agreement", etc/) _i_tems: "" , default hidden. enabled, item labels defined show_items spread across specific Venn overlap region. label_preset DEPRECATED favor show_labels. label_style character string indicating style label display. values "basic","none","shaded","lite","fill" style label background fill, presence "box" string draw border around label: "basic" "none" uses background fill, "lite" uses lite background fill, "fill" uses opaque fill overlap set color, "shaded" uses slightly transparent fill overlap set color, "box" displays border around label. lite character color used label_preset contains "lite". bg character color used background color figure, used outside labels determine whether text light dark proper visual contrast. set, overlap, percent, count, signed, items DEPRECATED favor show_labels. percent_delim character string used count percent labels enabled, delimiter two labels. default "
" causes newline, count percent values separate lines. Another suggestion ": " separates two values semicolon one line. show_items character string item label content, used items displayed. max_items numeric maximum number labels permitted items displayed. many items, item label suppressed. inside_percent_threshold numeric size polygon labels moved outside, labels otherwise displayed inside. Item labels affected setting. threshold calculated percent overall Venn diagram polygon area. label_types character vector one label types affected function. default "count" "signed" labels (labels) affected. extra_styles list two-element vectors, named type label, default list(percent=c("***", "***")) use "***" percentage label. label types supported. show_zero logical indicating whether display zero 0 empty overlaps overlap polygon exists. Default FALSE hides display zeros. sep character string used delimiter Venn set names. value generally changed. useGrey numeric value used jamba::setTextContrastColor() define appropriate contrasting color retains color saturation, default 15. Use useGrey=0 cause black white labels color saturation. verbose logical indicating whether print verbose output. ... additional arguments passed internal functions make_color_contrast().

title: venndir label style — venndir_label_style
text: function applies label style venndir() output, overwriting existing label style necessary. function adjusts label text color contrast make_color_contrast(), useful positioning label top dark bright colors. label positioned outside sp polygons, text assumed white background, using argument bg.

title: Add optional legend to venndir figures (developmental) — venndir_legender
code: venndir_legender(   venndir_output = NULL,   x = "bottomleft",   setlist = NULL,   set_colors = NULL,   unicode = TRUE,   sign_count_delim = NULL,   keep_newlines = FALSE,   legend_total = TRUE,   legend_percentage = NULL,   legend_signed = NULL,   combine_signed = TRUE,   combine_size = TRUE,   legend_color_style = c("fill", "border"),   box.lwd = 0,   legend_style = c("grid", "data.frame"),   item_type = "",   header_color = "#000000",   header_bg = "#FFFFFF00",   header_border = "#FFFFFF00",   lwd = 1,   x_inset = grid::unit(2, "lines"),   y_inset = grid::unit(2, "lines"),   font_cex = 1,   fontfamily = "Arial",   fontfamilies = list(signed = fontfamily, count = fontfamily, overlap = fontfamily),   poly_alpha = 0.8,   table_theme = NULL,   draw_legend = TRUE,   alias = NULL,   labels = NULL,   legend_padding = 3,   set_suffix = "",   vp = NULL,   verbose = FALSE,   ... )

title: Add optional legend to venndir figures (developmental) — venndir_legender
text: venndir_output Venndir object returned venndir(), used generate legend counts. supplied, set_colors also defined object. x character string indicating position legend, passed graphics::legend() legend_style="base". relevant legend_style="data.frame". setlist list alternative venndir_output supplied Venndir object. Used internally textvenn(). set_colors character optional vector R colors, whose names match names(setlist). supplied, colors inferred venndir_output, supplied, colors defined using colorjam::rainbowJam(). unicode logical default TRUE, whether use unicode arrows signed counts, used legend_signed=TRUE. argument passed curate_venn_labels(). keep_newlines logical indicating whether keep newlines (line breaks) set labels used Venn legend. legend_total logical default TRUE, whether include total unique items legend. FALSE also sets legend_percentage=FALSE. legend_percentage logical default NULL, whether include percentage total items represented set. option used legend_total=TRUE. set NULL display percentage present text label, show_labels include "p" "P". legend_signed logical default FALSE, whether include signed counts legend. set NULL displays signed counts available, requires: overlap_type "overlap", legend_df column "type" entries "sign". combine_signed logical default TRUE, whether combine multiple signed counts one column (TRUE), keep separate columns (FALSE). Somewhat experimental. option used signed counts included. combine_size logical default TRUE, whether combine counts "Size" column signed counts. TRUE, option also left-aligns "Size" column. legend_color_style character string customize colors used, c("fill", "border") default: "fill": use Venn fill color "border": use Venn border color "nofill": remove Venn fill color "noborder": remove Venn border color "greyfill": use "F4F4f4" grey fill color, matching Total. "greyborder": use "#999999" border color, matching Total. "blackborder": use "#000000" border color, matching Total. box.lwd numeric used define box line width, passed graphics::legend() legend_style="base". legend_style character string indicating style legend: "grid" uses gridExtra::grid.table() "data.frame" returns venndir legend data.frame. item_type character string used suffix counts displayed legend. Use item_type="" item_type=NULL hide suffix. header_color, header_bg, header_border character R colors define colors particular elements: header_color defines text color column headers. hide column header, currently use header_color="white", matching whatever color used header_bg. header_bg defines background fill color column headers. header_border defines border color header, also applied cells table. Note line drawn line width lwd. lwd numeric value line width used cell border legend table, legend_style="grid". x_inset, y_inset grid::unit object defines inset distance away plot edge, along x-axis y-axis, respectively. example x_inset=grid::unit(2, "lines") place legend table 2 character lines (defined line height typical character size) away left right edge plot. valid grid::unit can used, however using "lines" units provides consistent width rather using "npc" terms fraction overall plot width height. font_cex numeric adjustment default font sizes. default font size legend_style="grid" uses 12 point font, adjust specific font size like 8 points, use: font_cex=8/12 fontfamily character used default font labels, used fontfamilies default. However fontfamilies takes priority defined. fontfamilies list named elements: "overlap", "count", "signed", allow custom font element legend. argument also used assemble_venndir_label(). "overlap" font used set names, column headers. Column headers currently always bold. Note "overlap" used "Size" "Percent" columns, combine_size=TRUE signed counts cell therefore use font. combine_size=FALSE signed counts use "signed". table_theme list theme parameters described gridExtra::tableGrob(), gridExtra::ttheme_default(). supplied, font_cex argument ignored. list components include: base_size - default font size base_colour - default font color base_family - default font family parse - logical whether parse plotmath expressions padding - grid::unit() horizontal vertical padding within cell draw_legend logical indicating whether draw resulting legend. function development, legend_style="grid" seems preferred, however may useful return grob object manipulation rendering inside active plot. case, use arguments: legend_style="grid", draw_legend=FALSE. alias character vector optional set aliases, experimental feature allow referring entries setlist shorter aliases. Note names(alias) must also match names(setlist). Note: argument labels likely useful, since original call venndir() use setlist aliased names, expanded labels provided separately. labels character vector optional set labels, experimental feature supply longer label associated entry setlist. Note names(labels) must also match names(setlist). Note: useful workflow assign short aliases names(setlist) calling venndir(), use original long label names argument labels . legend_padding numeric grid::unit used define padding table cell. value used table_theme provided. set_suffix character string (default "") used optional suffix, previously used ":" changed "". verbose logical indicating whether print verbose output. ... additional arguments passed internal functions. Notably curate_venn_labels() may accept curate_df argument, allow custom labeling.

title: Add optional legend to venndir figures (developmental) — venndir_legender
text: data.frame legend information returned invisibly, unless using legend_style="grid", draw_legend=FALSE case legend grob object returned can manipulated rendering.

title: Add optional legend to venndir figures (developmental) — venndir_legender
text: Note function experimental active development. implementation arguments may change future. Limitations: Currently function relies upon setlist used produce venndir() output, venndir() output. future, setlist derived venndir() output object directly. step likely needs new function. using arguments legend_style="grid" draw_legend=FALSE grid grob object returned, can manipulated needed rendering. Note case, viewport already defined stored legend_grob$vp x position legend_grob$vp$x y position legend_grob$vp$y. Total legend width : sum(legend_grob$widths), total legend height : sum(legend_grob$heights). Todo: Consider bottom-justifying text cell, left-justifying text labels, right-justifying numeric values.

title: Add optional legend to venndir figures (developmental) — venndir_legender
code:
setlist <- make_venn_test(100, 3, do_signed=TRUE); # by default the legend is shown vo <- venndir(setlist) # move to different corner vo <- venndir(setlist, legend_x="bottomleft") # turn off the default legend vo <- venndir(setlist, draw_legend=FALSE) venndir_legender(setlist=setlist, venndir_output=vo, x="bottomleft") # test multi-line labels names(setlist) <- c("Group B-
Group A", "Group C-
\nGroup B", "Group_C-
\nGroupA") vo <- venndir(setlist, draw_legend=FALSE, show_segments=FALSE) venndir_legender(setlist=setlist, venndir_output=vo, x="bottomleft") # Same as above, showing how to render the legend_grob. # This method also "hides" the column headers. vo <- venndir(setlist, show_segments=FALSE, draw_legend=FALSE, font_cex=c(1, 1, 0.5, 0.5)) legend_grob <- venndir_legender(setlist=setlist, venndir_output=vo, draw_legend=FALSE, header_color="white", x="bottomleft") grid::grid.draw(legend_grob) # custom grid table theme vo <- venndir(setlist, show_segments=FALSE, draw_legend=FALSE) legend_grob <- venndir_legender(setlist=setlist, venndir_output=vo, headers=FALSE, x="bottomright", table_theme=gridExtra::ttheme_default(base_size=11, base_family="sans", padding=grid::unit(c(2, 2), "mm"))) # optional expanded labels, and subset setlist setlist <- make_venn_test(100, 5, do_signed=TRUE); vo <- venndir(setlist, sets=c(4, 1, 2), show_segments=FALSE, draw_legend=FALSE) venndir_legender(venndir_output=vo, font_cex=0.8, setlist=setlist, labels=jamba::nameVector( paste0("This is set ", LETTERS[1:5]), names(setlist))) # Venn with no border, and more transparent colors vo124 <- venndir(setlist, sets=c(1, 2, 4), poly_alpha=0.4, do_plot=FALSE) vo124@jps@polygons$border.lwd <- 0.1 vo124@jps@polygons$innerborder.lwd <- 0.1 vor124 <- render_venndir(vo124, draw_legend=FALSE) venndir_legender(setlist=setlist, venndir_output=vo124)

title: Convert venndir output to data.frame — venndir_to_df
code: venndir_to_df(   venndir_out,   df_format = c("hits", "items", "wide"),   return_type = c("data.frame", "kable"),   trim_blanks = TRUE,   wrap_width = 80,   colorize_headers = TRUE,   set_colors = NULL,   item_type = "gene",   add_counts = TRUE,   verbose = FALSE,   ... )

title: Convert venndir output to data.frame — venndir_to_df
text: venndir_out list output venndir() df_format character string, default "hits" output format: "hits" - returns hit matrix, first column containing item labels, subsequent columns indicate "hits" 0 +1 -1. "items" - returns one column overlap, containing item labels corresponding column. output include sign. "wide" - returns one row overlap_set/sign combination, column "items" list character vectors item labels. Rows may split "word wrapping" many items. output intended kable() formatting grouped rows, example argument return_type="kable". return_type character string indicating format output: "kable": returns object "knitr_kable" suitable printing HTML LaTeX. output recommended RMarkdown documents. "data.frame": returns data.frame object without colorization. trim_blanks logical whether remove rows 0 items. wrap_width numeric maximum width item text word-wrapped. disable word-wrapping use wrap_width=Inf. colorize_headers logical indicating whether color background header set_colors. ... additional arguments ignored.

title: Convert venndir output to data.frame — venndir_to_df
text: object class "data.frame" "knitr_kable" based upon argument return_type.

title: venndir 0.0.48.900
text: bumped colorjam>=0.0.30.900 pick new color blending additive alpha blending, useful repeating transparent color color become intense overlap.

title: venndir 0.0.48.900
text: Fixed error venndir_legender() empty signed lists.

title: venndir 0.0.48.900
text: find_venn_overlaps_JamPolygon() called venndir() Color blending uses improved algorithm colorjam additive alpha blending. example, transparent red used three sets become progressively less transparent overlap. probably dramatic, ’s good start. venn_meme() changed order default text labels applied 3-way 4-way Venn, special case 4-way proportional Venn (Euler) coded overlaps filled clockwise. Effort make easy copy Venn memes observed wild. label_fill_JamPolygon() calls updated version sample_JamPolygon() sample_JamPolygon() Added pattern="columns" layout option enforce points row, alternative default hexagonal/triangular. Updated logic choose appropriate subset points n defined. Now takes first row spread=FALSE. spread=TRUE spreads points column, row, somehow improves visual result, resulting fewer weird clusters points. assemble_venndir_label() Label assembly adjusted add customizable label line spacing, label padding. Added graphical tests.

title: venndir 0.0.47.900
text: Added Imports: eulerr, gtable (lightweight, also used ggplot2) Added Suggests: gridtext, marquee Count labels use grid::textGrob() default, since gridtext (kerning) marquee (R crash MacOS) “limitations”. Major refactoring label grouping: uses gtable instead gTree. Faster accurate height/width. Fixed labels slightly cropped. Simplified Venndir data model, columns longer used labels.

title: venndir 0.0.47.900
text: assemble_venndir_labels() - new workhorse function creates grobs, assembles gtable format. Reverts text_grob_type="marquee" text_grob_type="textGrob" MacOS using R-4.4.1 older. Applies fontfamily,fontface,fontsize,fontcolor type label, multiple labels, order.

title: venndir 0.0.47.900
text: render_venndir() Changed default fontfamily="sans" avoid “Arial” may present graphics devices. Help docs include useful ... arguments passed internal functions. Now calls assemble_venndir_labels(), draw_gridtext_groups(). Argument group_labels dropped, labels grouped. venn_meme() Changed default item_style="text" avoid kerning issues gridtext. venndir_legender() New default shows /counts shown Venn diagram. New default shows table borders. New argument legend_color_style controls color fill border. “Size” column now left-aligned, previously right-aligned. Added light grey shading “Total” row. Added leading/trailing whitespace columns.

title: venndir 0.0.47.900
text: grobs_exts(), grobs_stack(), grobs_tile(), grobs_xalign(), grobs_yalign(), draw_gridtext_groups() removed: reposition_venn_gridtext_labels()

title: venndir 0.0.46.900
text: Legend labels can include signed counts percentage values.

title: venndir 0.0.46.900
text: venndir_legender() can optionally include signed counts percentage. Renamed argument include_total=TRUE legend_total=TRUE, consistency next two arguments, help distinguish options specific legend. New argument legend_signed=FALSE defines whether show signed counts. NULL TRUE display signed counts present, example overlap_type “overlap”. legend_signed=FALSE always hide signed counts. New argument legend_percentage=NULL detects whether display percent total items, used legend_total=TRUE. show_labels includes percentage, TRUE, otherwise FALSE. venndir() Changed default segment_distance=0.05 previously 0.1, shrink distance outside labels Venn polygons. Outside labels now always justified relative plot, labels can placed closer, Venn diagram can drawn slightly larger. render_venndir() Changed default expand_fraction=NULL expand_fraction=0 detects whether adjust default condition draw_legend=TRUE, main supplied plot title. expands default location, shifts slightly upward.

title: venndir 0.0.45.900
text: render_venndir() Updated item_cex logic , solidifying association item_cex values specific, named Venn overlaps, also stored metadata persistence, editing. Related, fixed bug causing item_cex applied incorrectly empty items. Now applied overlap name keep proper sync.

title: venndir 0.0.45.900
text: render_venndir() Improved item_cex calculations, accounting relative area shape, number items, also imposing floor prevent microscopic font sizes. Fixed minor bug causing item_cex applied incorrectly missing/NA labels. venndir() default argument change: font_cex=c(1, 1, 0.7), 0.7 0.8. font_cex values secretly multiplied 1.2 slight adjustment default condition. sample_JamPolygon() New algorithm place points inside polygon, now using adaptive step sizes. Substantially fewer steps, much accurate, markedly faster. accurate, guaranteed use optimal pattern, finds closest match number points requested. spread=FALSE longer takes first n points, now takes middle n points. cases effect minimal. label_fill_JamPolygon() Now better working examples, plot labels review.

title: venndir 0.0.44.900
text: Venndir new methods: show() summarize contents metadata() metadata<- setlist() - returns original setlist overlaplist() overlapdf() - returns data.frame overlap items signed_counts() im() - return incidence matrix format modify_venndir_overlap(), highlight_venndir_overlap() Customize overlap set visual features, fill color, border, fontsize, font color. highlight function streamlines options draw distinctive border around one overlap sets.

title: venndir 0.0.44.900
text: General changes remove warnings, example minus_JamPolygon() throwing warnings empty polygon input output. Added tests area_JamPolygon() labelr_JamPolygon() couple weird cases nested holes, nested-nested solid polygons. venndir(), render_venndir() Now accepts incidence matrix input, sets colnames, items rows, c(-1, 0, 1) values. Added metadata slot persistence, though might added directly label_df persistence overlap label: main, template, overlap_type, draw_legend, item_buffer, item_cex, item_style, item_degrees show_segments, segment_buffer render_venndir() defaults NULL pull “metadata” slot, otherwise assigns previous defaults. now possible make Venndir object, render separately use original show_segments segment_buffer values. get_venn_polygon_shapes() small nudge default 4-way elliptical Venn shapes prevent rounding error overlaps ends sets 2 3, overlapping side edge sets 4 1, respectively. thing, nudging sets 1 4 prevent rounding error overlaps bottom edge. Previously miniscule “unique” shapes cornered edges slightly criss-crossed, since ellipses drawn N vertices, infinite number vertices. Possible side effect item fill sets 1 4 may now also use tiny section bottom item labels. signed_overlaps() Slightly changed keep_item_order=TRUE implemented, making markedly faster larger lists. labelr_JamPolygon() multi-part polygons, now uses largest disconnected polygon set, instead using polygons order. Apparently polylabelr::poi() uses first polygon provided, sometimes comically small. new method checks multi-part polygons, determines whether multiple parent polygons. polygons holes, sub-part polygons (holes, nested solid polygons within hole) need maintained appropriate parent. one parent, use -, since polylabelr::poi() works properly . Otherwise, use parent polygon largest net area. update improvement Venn diagrams, may optimal polygon purists, since polygon largest area may “labelable” polygon. said, polylabelr::poi() ignores first polygon anyway. label_fill_JamPolygon() improved default condition item buffer adjustment, now uses number items make buffer restrictive, longer uses relative polygon area. (adjustment conflicting item-shrinkage approach.) nudge_JamPolygon() New argument scale function accomplishes manipulations: nudge, rotate_degrees, scale.

title: venndir 0.0.43.900
text: label_fill_JamPolygon() Minor adjustment item buffer determined decreasing number items. Slightly centralized 3 fewer items. render_venndir() (venndir()) Now accepts item_buffer vector, recycled overlap sets. longer sorts item labels, instead expected sorted () signed_overlaps(). signed_overlaps() New argument keep_item_order=FALSE default sorts items using jamba::mixedSort() (proper alphanumeric sort). keep_item_order=TRUE keep items order originally appeared, allows fixed item label order displaying item labels. venn_meme() New argument keep_item_order=TRUE whose default keep overlap label order provided. Usually one label per overlap, provided list multiple entries, rendered order provided. Motivated efforts “reproduce Venn diagram paper.”

title: venndir 0.0.42.900
text: check_Venndir() - validation function Venndir objects. Fixed error validating Venndir, applying logical criteria vector size > 1. venn_meme() Changed default item_cex=1 consistent improvements item label scaling Venn overlap polygon size.

title: venndir 0.0.41.950
text: render_venndir() now applies halign=0.5 main count labels, helps display percentage labels centered main count. Percentage labels rounded integer values, except values 0 1 show one digit, excluding 0 1. venndir_label_style() new argument extra_styles intended customize text style different label types. Currently extra_styles=list(percent=c("***", "***")) format percentage labels bold,italic font.

title: venndir 0.0.41.900
text: Add plot titles! Arrange signed counts single column, main counts. Outside Venn labels default slightly toward top, rather sides. nudge_venndir_label() convenient moving inside outside labels.

title: venndir 0.0.41.900
text:
Venndir S4 object changes. New slot name "metadata" store miscellaneous settings. efforts made accept older Venndir objects without slot available. venndir() New argument main draw plot title. uses gridtext enable custom Markdown font options. provided, main also stored Venndir@metadata$main persistence. New argument template="wide" used arrange count signed count labels together: "wide" places side--side, "tall" places one column. provided, template also stored Venndir@metadata$template persistence. New argument center passed label_outside_JamPolygon(). default center=c(0, -0.15) tends place labels top rather left/right sides default. default use case improved. render_venndir() Now properly converts set names "\n" use "
" originally intended, “just works”. New arguments main template , except argument defined, use Venndir@metadata$template Venndir@metadata$main defined. nudge_venndir_label() New argument offset_list define list offsets one sets, set defined names(offset_list). New arguments align_x,align_y apply uniform alignment labels top/bottom/left/right set labels. Useful ensure labels y-position slightly different heights.

title: venndir 0.0.40.900
text: Updated label positioning logic, silenced unintended verbose output render_venndir().

title: venndir 0.0.39.950
text: Small change use gridGeometry 0.4.1 Github released CRAN, version fixes rare error caused proportional diagram innerborder, delta two circles creates small line zero area. update available CRAN. Thanks pmur002 rapid fix! Updated tests 0.0.39.900 skipped innerborder circumvent bug tests uncovered error. buffer_JamPolygon() default argument steps=20, formerly steps=200 () predominant rate-limiting step. nudge_JamPolygon() now recognizes rotate_degrees fixing bug previously allow rotating Venn diagram polygons.

title: venndir 0.0.39.900
text: render_venndir() Signed output now uses ":" instead ": " directional arrow count, example "^^:20" instead "^^: 20". Somehow whitespace calculation inconsistent, causing labels wider others gridtext::richtext_grob(), much wider whitespace anticipated. effect inconsistent even machine, RStudio R console, differed across machines also. Workarounds include choosing different fonts, apparently provide reliable whitespace calculations. change occurs rendering grobs created. underlying Venndir data changed. plot.JamPolygon(), affecting venndir() render_venndir() Now renders borders using gridGeometry thanks suggestion pmur002. Borders consistent, without small visual artifacts. Added "outerborder" formal border type. three types borders can rendered, order: outer, inner, border “outerborder” - begins outer edge boundary “border” - centered boundary “innerborder” - begins inner edge boundary border drawn, either innerborder outerborder drawn border prevent tiny artifact gap innerborder outerborder. venndir() Venndir object now uses outerborder instead border, sets border NA. New argument lwd controls default border line width. unicode (silent argument passed curate_venn_labels() controls Unicode character /arrows, disagreement, etc. can supply unicode=2 alternate symbols, though font-dependent, R-dependent, terminal-dependent. things must work well together (apparently). Use unicode=FALSE simple text. New default poly_alpha=0.6 makes background less intense. Now calls make_color_contrast() properly without forcing saturation, previously caused blue become cyan instead light blue. sample_JamPolygon() changed n_ratio=1 testing disliking previous n_ratio=4. venndir_to_df() gained new features: new argument df_format three formats: "hits" - essentially hit matrix 1, 0, -1 indicating direction "items" - column data.frame contains items Venn overlap. "wide" - intended RMarkdown summary - uses grouped rows display items Venn overlap. sure works well. argument return_type: "data.frame" (default) - returns data.frame "kable" - returns colorized kable table RMarkdown HTML textvenn() now returns column "color" mainly used venndir_to_df() calls colorjam::col_linear_xf() better colorization counts color_by_counts=TRUE. get_venn_polygon_shapes() Changed default return_type="JamPolygon" since transition JamPolygon, removed option "polygon_list". polygon_circles(), polygon_ellipses() now return JamPolygon.

text: polygon_list format loosely conformed polyclip data input/output, several exceptions motivated use JamPolygon: simple polygons encoded list, complex polygons encoded nested list; solid polygon encoded clockwise points, holes encoded counterclockwise. bbox_polygon_list() get_largest_polygon_list() intersect_polygon_list() labelr_polygon_list() minus_polygon_list() plot_polygon_list() polygon_list_labelr() rescale_polygon_list() union_polygon_list() get_venn_shapes() eulerr_to_polygon_list() polygon_areas() nudge_polygon_coords() nudge_polygon_list() polygon_list_to_xy_list() xy_list_to_polygon_list()

title: venndir 0.0.38.900
text: sample_JamPolygon() default changed spread=TRUE item labels evenly distributed default new argument n_ratio control target number points, spread=TRUE choose n evenly spaced. now, ratio set n_ratio=5 seems perform well. label_fill_JamPolygon() used display item labels inside Venn diagram, passes ... sample_JamPolygon() venndir() Change: names(setlist) characters ":" changed ".". ":" character used grid delimited name grobs, means names(setlist) also contain ":" create confusion. Easiest workaround maintain ":" characters setlist_labels legend_labels (display) remove ":" characters internal representation names. principle create new bugs, however possible something else depends upon internal names match original setlist names.

title: venndir 0.0.37.900
text: Added tests hidden count labels, hidden signed count labels, corresponding overlap counts good measure. Added laundry list topics document. Removed gridtext_richtext_grob() supporting functions.

title: venndir 0.0.37.900
text: plot.JamPolygon() New argument render_thin_border control whether thin line inner outer border drawn. may hidden default future. buffer can now vectorized, shift plot along side order: (bottom, left, top, right). default applies buffer side, sometimes useful shift plot away one side, example buffer=c(0.1, 0, 0, 0, 0). still maintains proper aspect ratio. Added checks line width 0, empty "" line colors, handled silently drawing either line width 0.01, transparent color, respectively. render_venndir() passes expand_fraction plot.JamPolygon using argument buffer can shift Venn diagram -center. now passes ... plot.JamPolygon() optional arguments recognized.

title: venndir 0.0.36.900
text: Substantial changes. method assembling labels now arranges labels adjacent , removing important dependency internal gridtext functions (permitted CRAN/Bioconductor). also allows flexible labeling future, e.g. different overlap metrics, optional overlap names. Labels use aesthetic layout: * main set label always top-center group labels. * Count labels split left/right columns, main/signed counts, respectively. middle-aligned left--right. * Set label count labels arranged top/bottom, also centered. * One region defined group labels. * previous arrangement can see group_labels=FALSE. graphics returned grid graphical objects (grobs), enables flexible options drawing figure. example can drawn inside grid::viewport, included patchwork cowplot figure panel. , grobs can directly manipulated.

title: venndir 0.0.36.900
text: venndir_label_style() Fixed issue associated count label interior overlap set, rare occurrence. Caused method used associate orphan set label, “uniquely set_B” overlap polygon associates “set_B” overlap region contains set_B. method incorrectly also allowed overlap count appear sets overlap region - occurs proportional circles fail find solution contains every overlap observed. fix hide overlap count labels overlap represented, still displaying main set label overlap exists contains set.

title: venndir 0.0.36.900
text: venndir() returns attributes "gtree", "grob_list", "viewport" do_plot=TRUE assigns padding radius using values. render_venndir() Returns attributes "gtree", "grob_list", "viewport" figure rendered one call grid::grid.draw() instead done piecemeal, making appear faster. longer calls custom gridtext_richtext_grob(), since also calls functions internal gridtext package. done order supply vector different padding values. Instead calls gridtext::richtext_grob() list. venndir_legender() Now left-aligns text label columns, right-aligns count value column. New argument legend_padding control table cell size. bug gridExtra::tableGrob() calculation padding caused left-aligned text appear left edge text box, without padded region shown. padding used extend box , still allows label aligned relative extended box, inner region. bug sidestepped enfocing leading/trailing whitespace. plot.JamPolygon() Modified return grid graphical objects, viewport defined. New argument do_draw control whether figure drawn, graphical objects returned. draw_gridtext_groups() - substantial changes, previous processing changed. used internally.

title: venndir 0.0.36.900
text: terribly exciting, useful nonetheless. Several new functions added help manipulate grid grobs, stack, tile, xalign, yalign grobs relative , using units keep aligned even plot device resized. functions probably dependent upon gridtext labels, since used create individual overlap count labels, define xext,yext “true” grid dimensions label. functions make possible center grouped label original label point, align left column right column, etc.

title: venndir 0.0.35.900
text: Added LICENSE LICENSE.md.

title: venndir 0.0.35.900
text: venndir() - relatively minor update, fixes unnamed setlist setlist duplicate NA names. Validates names(setlist) defined, otherwise integer numbers defined order. Validates names(setlist) unique, NA, otherwise calls jamba::makeNames() create unique names.

title: venndir 0.0.35.900
text: Fixed bug venndir() using sets define subset setlist causing colors sync. Added tests confirm duplicated NA names(setlist) handled.

title: venndir 0.0.34.900
text: Main goal fix bug associated empty nested setlist entries used proportional=TRUE. update somewhat risk, several core components updated venndir(), render_venndir() venndir_label_style(), impact number downstream steps. Corresponding testthis entries added, hopefully prevent occurrence new bugs. Added vdiffr R package Suggests. venndir(), render_venndir(), venndir_label_style() three functions now recognize new column Venndir slot jps column "ref_polygon". new column associates set name overlap polygon, points set label appropriate part polygon. example, default “set_A” point overlap_set “set_A” overlaps sets. proportional diagrams, sometimes “set_A” fully encompassed “set_B”, case label “set_A” point overlap polygon (1) empty course, (2) fewest overlaps. Without association, set label displayed, intended. , previous implementation incorrect, causing labels appear wrong position. line segment label overlap polygon still pointed correct position, awkwardly placed outside circle. turns moving set label affected assumptions data model, namely set name “set_A” may associated overlap_set different name, example "set_A&set_B". change broke label grouping logic, needed resolved.

title: venndir 0.0.34.900

title: venndir 0.0.33.900
text: venndir() New arguments: setlist_labels legend_labels use names(setlist) default, can adjusted display-friendly. setlist_labels displayed Venn diagram . legend_labels displayed Venn legend via venndir_legender(). list2im_opt() new default argument do_sparse=FALSE. Previously incidence matrix output used compressed Matrix class available. almost cases, immediately converted back matrix used do_sparse=FALSE anyway. wider use package, best improve default condition. Added examples rescale_coordinates().

title: venndir 0.0.32.900
text: render_venndir() Fixed regression recognize updated output venndir(), addressing issues #7 #8.

title: venndir 0.0.32.900
text:
venndir() render_venndir() Percent can now optionally labeled overlap, show_labels includes letter "p". "c" "p" included, two labels included order appear, separated using percent_delimiter default uses newline. now, percentage always appear location counts "c", unless counts hidden. example show_labels="Ncp" place set names outside, count percent inside. Similarly show_labels="Np" place set names outside, percent displayed inside. Also, show_labels="Npc" place percentage first, overlap count. New argument default item_style="default" auto-detect Markdown imposes item_style="gridtext" found, otherwise uses faster item_style="text". show_items=NA default changed items displayed, defined show_labels contains "". case overlap_type helps determine eithr show_items="item" show_items="sign item". Venndir-class - additional documentation. venndir_label_style() recognizes option include (hide) percent, location overlap count label. Argument percent_delim controls delimiter count percent, takes effect visible. default "
" places second value new line. venn_meme() change via hotfix: new argument draw_legend=FALSE hide Venn legend default, change default venndir() render_venndir(), since legend relevant venn_meme().

title: venndir 0.0.32.900
text: series small, simple unit tests added Venn diagrams, nested-proportional Venn, Venn empty set, etc.

title: venndir 0.0.31.900
text: sp rgeos references removed! work done improve use Venndir objects internally, “convenience functions” help access manipulate data.

title: venndir 0.0.31.900
text: add_orientation_JamPolygon(), area_JamPolygon(), plot.JamPolygon(), union_JamPolygon() updated improve detection empty polygons

what: REMOVED a bunch of sp/rgeos dependent functions
title: venndir 0.0.31.900
text: Note: functions , uh, functional anyway. functions called internally, replaced new functions call polyclip-based functions. Removed references sp rgeos package prefix, even help text.

title: venndir 0.0.30.900
text: polyclip update. Removing remnants sp rgeos. Major change, functions ported rewritten rely upon sp, rgeos, sf, since migration sf also incur heavy burden installing sf map/geography-related system libraries. Backward compatibility limited pre-existing venndir output, since rgeos removed CRAN (ugh). principle pre-existing object re-run produce new object output. Attempts made venndir() produce output equivalent previous versions, unclear practical may . graphical output uses grid, support base ggplot2. grid output chosen since can conveniently combined panels using patchwork cowplot, offering robust features position graphical components, also keeping 1:1 aspect ratio Venn circles remain circular. New S4 objects: JamPolygon - makeshift polygon data.frame hold one polygon per row (one “polygon” may represented multi-part polygon optional holes nested holes.) object makes calling polyclip grid functions reliable, since recognize slightly different formats. Venndir - replacement list output, equivalent content. transition function accessors obtain content, removing need direct list access.

title: venndir 0.0.30.900
text: added pracma, polyclip, vwline Depends. removed sf, sp, rgeos Depends. (Ack) removed ggtext Depends, output uses gridtext grid. replaced venndir() render_venndir() new versions, temporarily moving previous functions venndir_OLD() render_venndir_OLD(). new function item label fill, previously called spsample().

title: venndir 0.0.30.900
text: (may eventually become R package.) JamPolygon intended provide basic mechanism store polygon coordinates following design: One “polygon” stored one row data.frame. One “polygon” can include multiple parts, example including holes, nested polygons (polygon inside hole parent polygon), disjoint/separate polygon components. example one “polygon” represent multiple separate shapes, without holes enclosed polygons. driving reason handle proportional Venn diagrams, sometimes set fully enclosed inside another set creates hole larger set; sometimes two elliptical polygons overlap middle angle, unique portion one ellipse split two parts. Multi-part polygons assumed simplified, overlapping solid regions. (Polygons combined union_JamPolygon().) Multi-part polygons always use "evenodd" logic, inner polygon assumed hole, polygon inside hole assumed solid. logic applied regardless clockwise/counterclockwise orientation points polygon (polyclip convention: solid clockwise, holes counter-clockwise). Calls polyclip functions adjust polygon orientation needed purpose using polyclip, details important JamPolygon . properties can associated polygon row, help maintain view associations convenient way: name, label, fill, border, border.lwd, fontsize, family, innerborder, innerborder.lwd. Optional properties can added describe multi-polygon rows: orientation, polygon_holes, polygon_clockwise, polygon_parent. mostly useful internal functions. innerborder new feature, selfish desire enable borders overdrawn adjacent polygons (share border different sides). requires brilliant package vwline draw variable-width lines (thanks Paul Murrell). also requires knowledge direction lines drawn, order define left/right border relative path taken rendering border. plot rendering uses grid graphics. coordinates encoded JamPolygon object, can plotted separately, however plot() plot.JamPolygon() use grid. supporting functions JamPolygon: plot.JamPolygon() - grid draw function JamPolygon objects rbind2() - generic function combine multiple JamPolygon objects bbox_JamPolygon() - bounding box enclosing polygons area_JamPolygon() - area row, accounting holes nested polygons. buffer_JamPolygon() - expand shrink polygon borders point_in_JamPolygon() - test point inside solid portion polygons has_point_in_JamPolygon() - logical presence/absence point solid polygon add_orientation_JamPolygon() - adds polygon/multipolygon orientation, including holes, clockwise, parent enclosing polygon. labelr_JamPolygon() - define best label position within polygon minus_JamPolygon() - first polygon, removing subsequent polygons union_JamPolygon() - combine simplify polygons one row intersect_JamPolygon() - first polygon, intersecting subsequent polygons sample_JamPolygon() - define sample points within solid polygon split_JamPolygon() - split multi-part polygons onto separate rows. Note holes become solid polygons step. polyclip_to_JamPolygon() - convert polyclip::polyclip() output JamPolygon.

what: New object Venndir for venndir output
title: venndir 0.0.30.900
text: Intended replace previous list format, data accessor functions instead direct access list components.

title: venndir 0.0.29.900
text: bumped version dependency colorjam (>= 0.0.26.900) added steps plan migrate sp polyclip, avoiding heavy dependencies GDAL, GEOS, LWGEOM software libraries unrelated venndir’s use polygon geometry functions.

title: venndir 0.0.29.900
text:
venndir_to_df() intended convert Venn diagrams data.frame user-friendly kable formatted table suitable RMarkdown. removes "
" setlist names relevant.

title: venndir 0.0.29.900
text: several functions new argument blend_preset enforce colorjam::blend_preset() using RYB color preset.
